All-in-one Hair Colour Kit Pigmented Root Powder Hydrating Hair Mask Heat Protectant Spray Key Benefits Up to 100% Grey Coverage Root Coverage in an Instant Added Shine and Moisture Prevents Heat Damage When to use it? Once Every 4-6 Weeks Stray Grey Emergency Once a Week Before Styling Permanency Level Permanent Temporary - - How do I know what colour is right for me? We suggest that you choose a colour that is no more than two shades lighter or darker than your current hair colour. What if I currently use your custom colour? Can I find a perfect colour match? Please consult with your eSalon colourist. With custom colour, we use different pigments, developers, & formula types to match your exact goals. As this is a one-size-fits-all product, this formula may be different than what you are currently using. Is this permanent hair dye? Yes, this formula is ammonia-free, permanent hair dye. Will this hair colour cover my greys? eSalon hair colour offers up to 100% grey coverage. How long will this hair colour last? It can vary depending on the condition of your hair, how often you wash your hair, and what types of products you use. Generally, you can expect this hair colour to resist fading for about 30 washes.

product_details_tab_data.Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Oleic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Undeceth-3, Ethanolamine, Ethoxydiglycol, Sodium Sulfite, Cetrimonium Chloride, Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, N,N-Bis(2-Hydroxyethyl)-p-Phenylenediamine Sulfate, 5-Amino-6-Chloro-o-Cresol, Tetrasodium EDTA, 4-Chlororesorcinol, Phenoxyethanol, p-Aminophenol, 2-Methylresorcinol, Sodium Erythorbate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, m-Aminophenol, Panthenol, 2,4-Diaminophenoxyethanol HCl, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Silk Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Butylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Limonene, Fragrance (Parfum)
product_details_tab_data.Safety Warning: Caution: This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation on certain individuals and a preliminary test according to accompanying directions should first be made. This product must not be used for dyeing the eyelashes or eyebrows. Warning: Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse immediately if product comes into contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use this product on children.
